block.para: Get EXIF information from a JPG, JPEG, or PNG file, upload the image file to an &S3long; bucket, use &REKlong; to identify the three top attributes (labels in &REK;) in the file, and add the EXIF and label information to a &DDBlong; table in the Region.
For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
